LanguageData.DMSRC_InactiveMech.label: inactive automatroid
LanguageData.DMSRC_InactiveMech.description:
A chunk of a spacecraft. It seems to have been torn off either by uncontrolled re-entry forces or some kind of weapon.
Having landed not long ago, it still contains useful resources which you can acquire by deconstructing it.
LanguageData.DMSRC_LargeBroadcastAntenna.label: large broadcast antenna
LanguageData.DMSRC_LargeBroadcastAntenna.description: Ultra-large broadcast antenna for planetary communication. Allows to control mechanoids over the world from well-defended command center.
LanguageData.DMSRC_PowerTransmitter.label: power network node
LanguageData.DMSRC_SecurityContainer_NaraBlue.label: security container
LanguageData.DMSRC_SecurityContainer_NaraBlue.descrip: A hermetically-sealed armored container for preserving valuable items. Special security system will destroy any contents if container is destroyed or deconstucted.
LanguageData.DMSRC_SecurityContainer_NaraGreen.label: security container
LanguageData.DMSRC_SecurityContainer_NaraGreen.descri: A hermetically-sealed armored container for preserving valuable items. Special security system will destroy any contents if container is destroyed or deconstucted.
LanguageData.DMSRC_SecurityContainer_NaraRed.label: security container
LanguageData.DMSRC_SecurityContainer_NaraRed.descript: A hermetically-sealed armored container for preserving valuable items. Special security system will destroy any contents if container is destroyed or deconstucted.
LanguageData.DMSRC_WarheadPlatform.label: warhead platform
LanguageData.DMSRC_WarheadPlatform.description: Ultra-large computing core for large-scale command of mechs, It is a technology introduced by the colonial fleet while passing through a Glittering World.
